title: Cant view pre and post gamer chat.
body:
For some reason ever since a couple games ago I've become unable to view the pre game and post game chat, and it's becoming extremely obnoxious. For low elo OCE players like me I tend to often practice in Blind Pick. Although, not being able to view the chat cause me unable to coordinate with my team prior to the game.

With that being said, anyone have a fix to this?

replies.body: yes the entire chat box isn't displayed.

> [{quoted}](name=Lejester,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=bjE39lO0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-17T10:56:17.339+0000)
>
> yes the entire chat box isn't displayed.

Hey Lejester!

Can you try repairing your client and see if that resolves your issues?

Hey there,

When you say you're unable to view the chat do you mean the entire chat box doesn't display?
Or are you referring to something else?
